title: DJI Mavic 3 flies high with full obstacle avoidance, 5.1K camera & longer flights
content:
The all-new DJI Mavic 3 drone goes heavy on camera specs to create a flying filter that should give creators unprecedented video quality and options, including Apple ProRes 422 video capture. But thereâ€™s more to it than that, with a new omnidirectional array of obstacle sensors for flying-through-a-forest levels of obstacle avoidance, longer battery life,

The post DJI Mavic 3 flies high with full obstacle avoidance, 5.1K camera & longer flights appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
